text: Kunnamthanam is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala, India. ==Demographics== India census, Kunnamthanam had a population of 20157 with 9466 males and 10691 females. ==Geography== Kunnamthanam is one of the nine villages that form Mallapally Taluk of Pathanamthitta district. ==Language== Malayalam is the native language of Kunnamthanam. ==Politics== Kunnamthanam is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency. ==Weather== The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year. ==Transportation== The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC). ==Yoga village== Kunnamthanam organized mass yoga practise with 5,000 people. So it has been declared as a yoga village. ==Schools== * NSS HSS Kunnamthanam * St.Marys LP School Palakkathakidi ==References== ==Other websites== * Pathanamthitta District - official website Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Kunnamthanam
